timeline.bodyText: @olenagerasimova why using JSON here? I'd not put any volatile date to default 404 response. Same for headers
timeline.author: g4s8
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -44,6 +47,17 @@
         Flowable.empty()
     );
 
+    /**
+     * Not found response.
+     */
+    Response NOT_FOUND = con -> con.accept(
+        RsStatus.NOT_FOUND,
+        new ListOf<java.util.Map.Entry<String, String>>(
+            new MapEntry<>("Content-Type", "application/json")
+        ),
+        Flowable.fromArray(ByteBuffer.wrap("{\"error\" : \"not found\"}".getBytes()))
